description: Christina Aguilera's first full-length live concert DVD release at London's Wembley Arena during her first ever worldwide "Stripped" tour.
name: Christina Aguilera: Stripped Live in the UK

original_info.id: Christina Aguilera: Stripped: Live in the UK_2004
original_info.name: Christina Aguilera: Stripped: Live in the UK

review.name: Great great show !!!
review.reviewBody: I've seen Madonna in concert in September but I regret to have missed Christina because her show is much better ! She sings (live !) very well, the power of her voice is still amazing, and there's an incredible energy in her show. Really much more that in the one from Beyonce. Christina speaks a lot with her fans and the atmosphere is crazy. The dancers are extraordinary. Sets are great with fans, fire, huge screens, smoke, ... Special mention goes to Fighter (what energy !!!), At Last (Great), Beautiful (Wondeful song as usual), the Voice Within and What a Girl Wants. Congratulations Xtina and you know, you're are much more pretty with blacks rather than blonds hairs ;)
